Text: Enron Acceptance of EnrollmentCongratulations This email is to confirm that your childchildren will be enrolled in the inaugural class of Enron Kids Center September We are excited to welcome your family to our stateoftheart program and facility The operator of the Enron Kids Center Knowledge Beginnings will send written notification to you of acceptance of enrollment on April In order to hold your childchildrens space in the Enron Kids Center you must send a nonrefundable registration payment to Knowledge Beginnings You will have calendar days to pay the enrollment fee of either per family if one child is enrolled or per family if more than one child is enrolled If payment of the enrollment fee has not been received by Knowledge Beginnings by the close of the business day on May your spaces will be forfeited Forfeited spaces are treated as new openings and will be filled from the waiting list After payment of your enrollment fee but prior to the opening of the Enron Kids Center should you decide not to enroll your child in the center for reasons other than relocation termination of employment with Enron or extenuating circumstances the enrollment fee will also be forfeited Please send your check to Knowledge BeginningsEnron Kids Center Redwood Highway Building B San Rafael CA If you have any questions please call the Knowledge Beginnings customer service center at CHILDHOOD We look forward to welcoming you to the Enron Kids Center this fall

Enron Kids Center Enrollment AcknowledgementPST Victoria Thank you for your PreEnrollment Application for our Enron Kids Center If you have questions related to the care of your child lottery room capacity tuition waitlisting etcplease email your questions to If you have questions related to enrollment information please email Thanks again Catherine
